?.Action: Value 'copy' : Copy files. Value 'move' : Move files. Value is not case sensitive

Source.Recurse: Value TRUE : search root folder and child folders for files. Value FALSE : search only in root folder for files
Source.MatchFileNameRegex: Value '*.*' : process all files. Value '*.xlsx' : process only Excel files.

?.ProcessFilesCreatedInTheLastNumberOfDays: Value 0 : process all files in the source folder, no filter. Value 1 : process files created since yesterday morning. Value 5 : Process files created in the last 5 days. ...
